subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Mattingly, the Los Angeles manager, was once again second-guessed by fans, this time for removing Kershaw before David Wright’s key hit in the Mets’ Game 1 victory.
snippet: Mattingly, the Los Angeles manager, was once again second-guessed by fans, this time for removing Kershaw before David Wright’s key hit in the Mets’ Game 1 victory.
